metadata.title: CVE-2023-2721 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Navigation in Google Chrome prior to 113.0.5672.126allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Critical)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
